targets.rawSql: SELECT 'Regions' AS title

SELECT 
  id AS "Region Code",
  name AS "Region Name"
FROM region
ORDER BY name

SELECT 
  id AS "Region Code",
  name AS "Region Name"
FROM region
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "Categories" FROM category
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "Channels" FROM channel

SELECT 
  SUM("videosPublished") AS "Videos"
FROM video_summary

SELECT 
  SUM("viewCount") AS "Views",
  SUM(likes) AS "Likes",
  SUM(dislikes) AS "Dislikes",
  SUM("commentCount") AS "Comments"
FROM video_summary

SELECT
  "dowPublished" AS "Day",
  SUM("viewCount") AS "Views 2020"
FROM video
WHERE 
  EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "publishedAt" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') = 2020
GROUP BY "Day"
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "dowPublished" AS "Day",
  SUM("viewCount") AS "Views 2021"
FROM video
WHERE 
  EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "publishedAt" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') = 2021
GROUP BY "Day"
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "dowPublished" AS "Day",
  SUM("viewCount") AS "Views 2022"
FROM video
WHERE 
  EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "publishedAt" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') = 2022
GROUP BY "Day"
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "dowPublished" AS "Day",
  SUM("viewCount") AS "Views 2023"
FROM video
WHERE 
  EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "publishedAt" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') = 2023
GROUP BY "Day"
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Views Per Day Of The Week

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  year AS "Year",
  SUM("videosPublished") AS "Videos Published"
FROM video_summary
GROUP BY year
ORDER BY year  DESC

SELECT 
  "day" AS "Best Day",
  AVG("ViewCount") AS "Total Views"
FROM (
  SELECT
    "dowPublished" AS "day",
    SUM("viewCount") AS "ViewCount"
  FROM video
  WHERE 
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "publishedAt" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') IN (2020,2021,2022,2023)
  GROUP BY "day"
  ORDER BY 1
) AS perDOWperYear
GROUP BY "day"
ORDER BY "Total Views" DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Best Day Of The Week For Views

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  
  statsPerChannel."Videos Per Channel",
  SUM(statsPerChannel."Views Per Channel") AS "Total Views",
  AVG(statsPerChannel."Views Per Channel") AS "Average Views"
FROM 
  (SELECT 
      COUNT(id) AS "Videos Per Channel",
      SUM("viewCount") AS "Views Per Channel"
    FROM video
    GROUP BY "channelId"
  ) AS statsPerChannel
GROUP BY statsPerChannel."Videos Per Channel"
ORDER BY statsPerChannel."Videos Per Channel" ASC

panels.title: Views Per Number Of Videos Posted Per Channel

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  title AS "Channel",
  "videosPublished" AS "Videos Published"
FROM 
  channel
where "videosPublished" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY "Videos Published" DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT 
  max_freq,
  category.title
FROM into_values((SELECT mcv_agg(1, "categoryId") FROM video)) AS values
JOIN category ON category.id = values.value
ORDER BY max_freq DESC
LIMIT 3

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      video."categoryId",
      SUM("viewCount") AS "Views"
    FROM video
    GROUP BY video."categoryId"
    ORDER BY SUM("viewCount") DESC
    LIMIT 3
  )
SELECT 
  category.title AS "Category",
  category.id AS "Category ID",
  most."Views"
FROM 
  category, most
WHERE 
  category.id = most."categoryId"

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      video."channelId",
      SUM("viewCount") AS "Views"
    FROM video
    GROUP BY video."channelId"
    ORDER BY SUM("viewCount") DESC
    LIMIT 3
  )
SELECT 
  channel.title AS "Channel",
  most."channelId" AS "Channel ID",
  most."Views"
FROM 
  channel, most
WHERE 
  channel.id = most."channelId"
ORDER BY most."Views" DESC

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      video.title AS "Video Title", 
      video."channelId",
      video."categoryId" AS "Category",
      MAX("viewCount") AS "Views"
    FROM
      video
    GROUP BY video.id
    ORDER BY MAX("viewCount") DESC
    LIMIT 3
  )
SELECT 
  most."Video Title", 
  channel.title AS "Channel", 
  most."channelId" AS "Channel ID",
  category.title AS "Category",
  category.id AS "Category ID",
  most."Views"
FROM 
  channel, most, category
WHERE 
  channel.id = most."channelId" 
  AND category.id = most."Category"
ORDER BY most."Views" DESC

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      video.title AS "Video Title", 
      MAX(likes) AS "Likes",
      video."channelId",
      video."categoryId" AS "Category"
    FROM
      video
    GROUP BY video.id
    ORDER BY MAX(likes) DESC
    LIMIT 3
  )
SELECT 
  most."Video Title", 
  channel.title AS "Channel", 
  most."channelId" AS "Channel ID",
  category.title AS "Category",
  category.id AS "Category ID",
  most."Likes"
FROM 
  channel, most, category
WHERE 
  channel.id = most."channelId" 
  AND category.id = most."Category"
ORDER BY most."Likes" DESC

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      video.title AS "Video Title", 
      MAX(dislikes) AS "Dislikes",
      video."channelId",
      video."categoryId" AS "Category"
    FROM
      video
    GROUP BY video.id
    ORDER BY MAX(dislikes) DESC
    LIMIT 3
  )
SELECT 
  most."Video Title", 
  channel.title AS "Channel", 
  most."channelId" AS "Channel ID",
  category.title AS "Category",
  category.id AS "Category ID",
  most."Dislikes"
FROM 
  channel, most, category
WHERE 
  channel.id = most."channelId" 
  AND category.id = most."Category"
ORDER BY most."Dislikes" DESC

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      video.title AS "Video Title", 
      video."channelId",
      video."categoryId" AS "Category",
      MAX("commentCount") AS "Comments"
    FROM
      video
    GROUP BY video.id
    ORDER BY MAX("commentCount") DESC
    LIMIT 3
  )
SELECT 
  most."Video Title", 
  channel.title AS "Channel", 
  most."channelId" AS "Channel ID",
  category.title AS "Category",
  category.id AS "Category ID",
  most."Comments"
FROM 
  channel, most, category
WHERE 
  channel.id = most."channelId" 
  AND category.id = most."Category"
ORDER BY most."Comments" DESC

SELECT 
  $year AS "Year"

SELECT 
  SUM("videosPublished") AS "Videos Published"
FROM video_summary
WHERE year = $year 
GROUP BY "year"

SELECT
  SUM("trendsCount") AS "Trends"
FROM trend_summary
WHERE year = $year 
GROUP BY "year"

SELECT 
  "regionId" AS "Region",
  SUM("trendingCategories") AS "Categories"
FROM trend_summary
WHERE year = $year 
GROUP BY "regionId"
ORDER BY "Categories" DESC

SELECT 
  "regionId" AS "Region",
  SUM("trendingVideos") AS "Videos"
FROM trend_summary
WHERE year = $year 
GROUP BY "regionId"
ORDER BY "Videos" DESC

SELECT 
  "regionId" AS "Region",
  SUM("trendingChannels") AS "Channels"
FROM trend_summary
WHERE year = $year 
GROUP BY "regionId"
ORDER BY "Channels" DESC

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      "categoryId",
      COUNT(*) AS "Trends"
    FROM trend
    WHERE 
      EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "trendingDate" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') = $year
    GROUP BY "categoryId"
    ORDER BY "Trends" DESC
    LIMIT 10
  )
SELECT 
  category.title AS "Category",
  most."Trends"
FROM 
  category, most
WHERE 
  category.id = most."categoryId"
ORDER BY "Trends" DESC

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      "channelId",
      COUNT(*) AS "Trends"
    FROM trend
    WHERE 
      EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "trendingDate" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') = $year
    GROUP BY "channelId"
    ORDER BY "Trends" DESC
    LIMIT 10
  )
SELECT 
  channel.title AS "Channel",
  most."Trends"
FROM 
  channel, most
WHERE 
  channel.id = most."channelId"

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      "videoId",
      COUNT(*) AS "Trends"
    FROM trend
    WHERE 
      EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "trendingDate" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') = $year
    GROUP BY "videoId"
    ORDER BY "Trends" DESC
    LIMIT 10
  )
SELECT 
  video.title AS "Video",
  most."Trends"
FROM 
  video, most
WHERE 
  video.id = most."videoId"
ORDER BY "Trends" DESC
